about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey with Oroboros, an RPG game where your choices shape the story and determine your fate. You are a sky pirate, stranded on a floating island in a world shattered by the Oroboros, a giant creature that roams the cosmos in search of warmth and a good meal.

FEATURES

  • Unique skill system: Discover and unlock new combat skills and abilities as you play. Intimidate, sweet-talk, or resort to violence to achieve your goals.
  • Diverse characters: Interact with unforgettable characters, each with their own motivations and goals. Play them against each other, try to help them, or fall hopelessly in love.
  • Open world exploration: Explore the floating islands, discover new areas, and uncover the secrets of the mountain stones.
  • Crafting and building: Craft tools and weapons to aid you in your journey and help the survivors to build shelters to protect them from the heat wave of Oroboros.
  • Dynamic story: Make choices that shape the story and determine your fate. Will you become a hero or an absolute disaster of a human being?
  • Unique factions: Face other faction that are also interested by the mountain stone and the Oroboros, some are more technologically advanced than others.
  • Political vision quests: Face the reality of your worldview as your political compass leads you down new paths.
  • Countless tools for role playing: Mix and match from different skills and abilities, develop a personal style with various clothing items, and wield tools.
  • Revolutionary dialogue system: The world is alive with real people, not extras. Ask probing questions, make insightful observations, or express your wildest desires as you play.
  • Breathtaking graphics and amazing music

Embark on an epic journey with Oroboros, an RPG game where your choices shape the story and determine your fate. You are a sky pirate, stranded on a floating island in a world shattered by the Oroboros, a giant creature that roams the cosmos in search of warmth and a good meal.

FEATURES

  • Unique skill system: Discover and unlock new combat skills and abilities as you play. Intimidate, sweet-talk, or resort to violence to achieve your goals.
  • Diverse characters: Interact with unforgettable characters, each with their own motivations and goals. Play them against each other, try to help them, or fall hopelessly in love.
  • Open world exploration: Explore the floating islands, discover new areas, and uncover the secrets of the mountain stones.
  • Crafting and building: Craft tools and weapons to aid you in your journey and help the survivors to build shelters to protect them from the heat wave of Oroboros.
  • Dynamic story: Make choices that shape the story and determine your fate. Will you become a hero or an absolute disaster of a human being?
  • Unique factions: Face other faction that are also interested by the mountain stone and the Oroboros, some are more technologically advanced than others.
  • Political vision quests: Face the reality of your worldview as your political compass leads you down new paths.
  • Countless tools for role playing: Mix and match from different skills and abilities, develop a personal style with various clothing items, and wield tools.
  • Revolutionary dialogue system: The world is alive with real people, not extras. Ask probing questions, make insightful observations, or express your wildest desires as you play.
  • Breathtaking graphics and amazing music

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux/X11
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

name: Oroboros

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Embark on an epic journey as a sky pirate in Oroboros, an RPG game where your choices shape the story and determine your fate. Explore floating islands, craft tools, and face other factions in a world shattered by the Oroboros.
